There are four attributes for characters; EYES, TEETH, LIMBS, and HEART.

## EYES
<center>
![](images/eyes_attribute.png){style="width:200px"}
</center>

[Nyxmera](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/nyxmera.html) is the deity of the sky. Its eyes are the sun, stars, planets, and moons in the sky. __Nyxmera__ loves to watch, enjoying drama and comedy. It is knowledgeable and always hungers for new information.

You can roll __+EYES__ for assessing and manipulating a situation.

- Knowledge-based tasks
- STEM
- Tactical manoeuvres
- Technical operations
- Reconnaissance & Research
- Astral powers


## JAWS
<center>
![](images/jaws_attribute.png){style="width:200px"}
</center>

[Tartarus](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/tartarus.html) is the deity of the earth. Its __jaws__ are the entrances into its domain and its prison, The DOT. It is angry, greedy and destructive.

You can roll __+JAWS__ for bouts of strength, violence, or rage.

- Strength-based tasks
- Athletics
- Aggressive manoeuvres
- Destruction & consumption
- Freeing the imprisoned
- Earth and fire powers

## LIMBS
<center>
![](images/limbs_attribute.png){style="width:200px"}
</center>

[Proteus](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/proteus.html) is the deity of water.
Its limbs represent how it reaches into and shapes living systems whilst in turn being shaped by them.
It is adaptable, calm, and flowing.

You can roll __+LIMBS__ for fast and fluid movements.

These include:

- Dexterity-based tasks
- Reflexive manoeuvres
- Use of steady hands and body
- Blending in
- Going with the flow
- Water powers

## BRAIN
<center>
![](images/nerves_attribute_final.png){style="width:200px"}
</center>

[Gaia](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/gaia.html) is the deity of life.
Its __nerves__ connect all living creatures, the cells, to it, the brain. 
In this way all life is a hyperorganism. 
It is social and mystical.

You can roll __+NERVES__ for human and paranormal interactions.

These include:

- Charisma-based tasks
- Humanities and arts
- Diplomatic manoeuvres
- Unique and creative ideas
- Leadership and persuasion
- Life and mind powers
